mapper.insert: insert into purchase_table (purchase_id, purchase_cycle, purchase_time, state) values (#{purchaseId} , #{purchaseCycle} , #{purchaseTime} , #{state})

insert into purchase_list (purchase_id, material_name, number) VALUES
(#{id} , #{name} , #{val})

mapper.update: update purchase_table set state = #{state} where purchase_id = #{id}
mapper.delete: delete from purchase_table where purchase_id = #{id}; delete from purchase_list where purchase_id = #{id};
mapper.select: select * from purchase_table where purchase_id like '%${keyword}%' or order_id like '%${keyword}%' or purchase_cycle like '%${keyword}%'
